tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WineVarieties ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    variety_name VARCHAR(100), 
    origin VARCHAR(100), 
    sweetness_level VARCHAR(50), 
    acidity_level VARCHAR(50), 
    rating FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE WineVarieties ( 
    wine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    variety_name STRING NOT NULL, 
    origin_country STRING, 
    vintage_year INT, 
    alcohol_content DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE TastingNotes ( 
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    wine_id UUID NOT NULL, 
    taster_name STRING, 
    tasting_date DATE, 
    aroma_description STRING, 
    flavor_profiles STRING[] 
);

CREATE TABLE wines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    origin VARCHAR(100),
    vintage INT,
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE tasting_notes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_id INT,
    notes TEXT,
    taster VARCHAR(100),
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE regions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(100),
    climate VARCHAR(100),
    soil_type VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE WineVarieties (
   variety_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   variety_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   grape_type VARCHAR(100),
   region VARCHAR(100),
   vintage_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE TastingNotes (
   note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   variety_id INT,
   tasting_date DATE,
   aroma_notes TEXT,
   flavor_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WinePrices (
   price_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   variety_id INT,
   price DECIMAL(10,2),
   currency VARCHAR(10),
   source VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE WineRatings (
   rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   variety_id INT,
   rating DECIMAL(3,1),
   reviewer VARCHAR(255),
   review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tasting_notes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variety_id INT,
    note TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (variety_id) REFERENCES wine_varieties(id)
);
